name: Mint Lime Granita
description: This simple, refreshing dessert is a great option if you want a frozen treat but don't have an ice cream maker.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, combine water, mint leaves, and sugar. Turn heat to medium high and stir until sugar has dissolved. Continue to cook until mixture comes to a boil. Reduce to a simmer and cook for 5 minutes.*
Let mixture cool slightly then stir in lime juice. Pour mixture into glass baking dish and put in freezer.
Every hour or so, scrape mixture with a fork, continuing until frozen, about three and a half hours.
